es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica5.bgame.views

Class GameWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica5.bgame.views.GameWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObserver, SettingsPanel.SettingsListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GameWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements GameObserver, SettingsPanel.SettingsListener
    The frame which manages the whole game UI.
    Author:
    Jorge & Álvaro
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameWindow

        public GameWindow(BoardJPanel boardPanel,
                  SettingsPanel otherSettings,
                  Piece owner)
        Creates a gameWindow from a board panel, a settings panel and the owner.
        Parameters:
        boardPanel - the panel that shows the board.
        otherSettings - the panel that shows the settings.
        owner - the player to which the window belongs. null if this window manages multiple players.

      • setGameChangesListener

        public void setGameChangesListener(GameWindow.GameChangesListener changesListener)
        Sets the game changes listener.
        Parameters:
        changesListener - the new listener.

      • setCurrentlyManual

        public void setCurrentlyManual(boolean currentlyManual)
        Set the boolean which marks if the mode of the current player is manual. Calling this method will enable or disable the panels as needed. The GameWindow cannot work it out by itself in the multiviews option, because it knows nothing about how the game is going. This method is intended to be called by the controller.
        Parameters:
        currentlyManual - the updated value

      • disableUserInput

        public void disableUserInput()
        Disables user input that affects other windows aside from his own during moves

      • enableUserInput

        public void enableUserInput(Piece turn)
        Enables the necessary user input, depending on whose turn it is and on the settings.
        Parameters:
        turn - the piece which is currently playing.

      • onGameStart

        public void onGameStart(Board board,
                        java.lang.String gameDesc,
                        java.util.List<Piece> pieces,
                        Piece turn)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that a game has started.

        Notifica que se ha iniciado un juego.

        Specified by:
        onGameStart in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        gameDesc - A string describing the currently played game.

        Un string que describe el juego al que se esta jugando.

        pieces - A list of pieces that are used to play the game (each piece belongs to a player).

        Lista de fichas que se utilizan para jugar a este juego (cada ficha pertenece a un jugador).

        turn - The piece to be played next.

        Ficha a la que corresponde mover.

      • onGameOver

        public void onGameOver(Board board,
                       Game.State state,
                       Piece winner)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that a game has finished (with a winner, draw, or stopped).

        Notifica que ha terminado un juego (con un ganador, en tablas, o se ha interrumpido).

        Specified by:
        onGameOver in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        state - The state in which the game has finished.

        Estado en el que ha quedado el tablero.

        winner - The piece of the winner, if the game has finished with a winner, otherwise null.

        Ficha del ganador si el juego ha terminado con un ganador, o null en caso contrario.

      • onMoveEnd

        public void onMoveEnd(Board board,
                      Piece turn,
                      boolean success)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that the execution of a move has finished.

        Notifica que ha terminado la realizaciÃ³n de un movimiento.

        Specified by:
        onMoveEnd in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        turn - The piece that was supposed to be played by the move.

        Ficha a la que correspondia mover en el movimiento que acaba de terminar.

        success - true if the move has been executed successfully, otherwise false.

        true si el movimiento se ha realizado correctamente, false en caso contrario.

      • onModeChange

        public void onModeChange(java.lang.String mode,
                         java.lang.String pieceId)
        Description copied from interface: SettingsPanel.SettingsListener
        Notifies the receiver that a player mode change has been requested by the user
        Specified by:
        onModeChange in interface SettingsPanel.SettingsListener
        Parameters:
        mode - the new player mode. It may only have valid values, to be converted to a VisualController#PlayerMode.
        pieceId - the piece whose mode is to be changed.
